Patience Torlowei (a mụrụ n'ụbọchị nke 24 n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 1964) bụ onye Naijiria na-emepụta ejiji
Ọ bụ onye kéré "Esther Dress", nke mbụ nke ejiji nke sonyere Smithsonian Institution's National Museum of African Art's permanent collection.
A mụrụ ya na Enugu na nne na nna Ijaw, Torlowei gụsịrị akwụkwọ na ngalaba Textile Arts and Technology na Yaba College of Technology
Dị ka onye na-emepụta ejiji, ọ rụrụ ọrụ iji mepụta uwe agbamakwụkwọ na akwa lingerie yana uwe dị njikere. O guzobere akara ejiji ya, Patience Please, n'afọ 2006.
Uwe nke Torlowei, Esther, mere ugbu a bụ nke National Museum of African Art (NMAA) na Washington, D.C.; ọ bụ nke mbụ nke haute couture ịbanye na nchịkọta ihe ngosi nka

Ọ na-egosi ihe nkiri nke mmanụ na diamond na nke agha, a na-ejikwa ihe dị iche iche gụnyere ákwà ọla edo. E gosipụtara ibe a na mbụ na ihe ngosi ejiji na ụlọ ngosi ihe mgbe ochie na 2014. E tinyere Torlowei na ihe ngosi 2019 "Abụ m..
Contemporary Women Artists of Africa" na NMAA.
